This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Unidentified objet at Battle Creek air show.
divs: sighting detailsmy son, girlfriend, and her father attended the battle creek airshow on 7\4\09. honestly,we didn't notice anything out of the ordinary. however, when my girlfriend e-mailed the pictures we took to me, while i was cropping and zooming, i noticed a dot in the sky. when i zoomed in, it was not just a dot. there was something else in the sky that was out of the ordinary. it has a mass to it, and is unlike any aircraft that i am aware of. at first i thought that it might be an error or a piece of dust on the lense, but the object showed up in 3 of the photographs, out of about 20. it is in the first picture above a helicopter that was flying around 2:00 when the air show started, and it also shows up durring the thunderbird demonstration that ended around 4:45. i am interested to see if anyone else captured the object. i am attaching the photos unedited to give reference to the distance, and altitude.
